meanings.def: used when the speaker or writer is also the person affected by an action
examples: I cut myself on a knife.
I wrote a message to myself.
I found myself unable to speak.
I haven't been feeling myself recently (= I have not felt well).
I needed space to be myself (= not influenced by other people).

meanings.def: used to emphasize the fact that the speaker is doing something

examples: I painted the room all by myself.

meanings.def: for the speaker or writer alone to have or use; not shared
examples: I had a whole pizza to myself.
I painted the room all by myself.

idioms.def: for the speaker or writer alone to have or use; not shared
examples: I had a whole pizza to myself.
